Footer.title: Toolsify AI Directory
Footer.subTitle: Track the fastest-growing AI software, learn how teams deploy automation, and submit your own product for discovery.

Faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Faq.subTitle: Everything you need to know about submitting, discovering, and promoting AI tools on Toolsify AI

1.question: What is the Toolsify AI Tools Directory?
1.answer: Toolsify AI is an open-source directory that curates the best AI software for copywriting, marketing, research, design, development, audio, video, productivity, and more so you can evaluate the right tool in minutes.

2.question: How do I discover AI tools on Toolsify AI?
2.answer-1: 1. Visit Toolsify.ai and enter a keyword or category.
2.answer-2: 2. Use smart filters for pricing, industry, and use case to shortlist options.
2.answer-3: 3. Open any listing to view features, screenshots, and direct website links.

3.question: What makes Toolsify AI different?
3.answer-1: 1. Free, curated listings reviewed by the community and our editorial team.
3.answer-2: 2. Growth resources including startup launch directories, backlink ideas, and marketing tips.

4.question: Is it free to submit my AI product?
4.answer: Yes. Submissions are free and typically reviewed within 48 hours. We recommend adding a backlink to Toolsify.ai to speed up approval.

5.question: Which AI categories are supported?
5.answer: Toolsify AI covers 50+ categories including content creation, design, analytics, customer support, engineering, data, productivity, compliance, and more.

6.question: How often is the directory updated?
6.answer: New AI tools are reviewed and published daily. Existing listings are refreshed to reflect pricing or feature changes.

7.question: Can I find GPT-4o, Sora, and other flagship models here?
7.answer: Yes. We maintain dedicated sections for GPT-4o, Sora, and other flagship AI products with direct links to demos, pricing, and documentation.

8.question: What should I do if listings are not loading?
8.answer: Try refreshing the page, clearing your browser cache, or disabling extensions. If issues persist, email contact@6677.ai with screenshots so we can help.

9.question: Who writes the tool descriptions?
9.answer: Descriptions are drafted with GPT-4o, then fact-checked and edited by the Toolsify AI editorial team to ensure accuracy and clarity.

10.question: Do you provide licenses for the tools listed?
10.answer: Toolsify AI is a directory. Licensing and usage rights are controlled by each vendor—please review the official website of any tool you plan to use.

privacyPolicy.1-p1: This page is used to inform visitors regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use our Service.
privacyPolicy.1-p2: If you choose to use our Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that we collect is used for providing and improving the Service. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.
privacyPolicy.1-p3: The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions.
privacyPolicy.2-p: For a better experience, while using our Service, I may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information. The information that I request will be retained on your device and is not collected by me in any way. The app does use third-party services that may collect information used to identify you.
privacyPolicy.3-p: I want to inform you that whenever you use my Service, in a case of an error in the app I collect data and information (through third-party products) on your phone called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol ('IP') address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing my Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics.
privacyPolicy.4-p: Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are commonly used as anonymous unique identifiers. These are sent to your browser from the websites that you visit and are stored on your device's internal memory. This Service does not use these "cookies" explicitly. However, the app may use third party code and libraries that use "cookies" to collect information and improve their services. You have the option to either accept or refuse these cookies and know when a cookie is being sent to your device. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of this Service.
privacyPolicy.5-p-1: I may employ third-party companies and individuals due to the following reasons:
privacyPolicy.5-li-2: To provide the Service on our behalf;
privacyPolicy.5-li-4: To assist us in analyzing how our Service is used;
privacyPolicy.5-p-2: I want to inform users of this Service that these third parties have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.
privacyPolicy.6-p: I value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and I cannot guarantee its absolute security.
privacyPolicy.7-p: This Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by me. Therefore, I strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. I have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.
privacyPolicy.8-p: I may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. I will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately after they are posted on this page.

termsConditions.1-p1: Welcome to Toolsify AI Directory! Our website, located at https://Toolsify.ai ("Website"), is dedicated to providing you with the ability to discover and explore AI tools.
termsConditions.1-p2: By accessing or using our Website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree with any part of the terms, then you are prohibited from using the Website.
termsConditions.2-p: You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the Website and its services for personal, non-commercial purposes. This license does not include any rights to copy, modify, or distribute the Website's content or use it for commercial purposes without our prior written consent.
termsConditions.3-p: The ownership of images generated from text on the Website belongs to the person who created the image. Toolsify.ai claims no ownership over images created by users.
termsConditions.4-p: We collect personal data (name, email, and payment information) and non-personal data (web cookies) to improve our services. The use of this data is governed by our Privacy Policy, which can be found at
termsConditions.5-p: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States of America, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
termsConditions.6-p: Toolsify AI Directory reserves the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. We will notify users of any changes by email. Your continued use of the Website after any change in these Terms will constitute your acceptance of such changes.
termsConditions.7-p: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at contact@6677.ai.
termsConditions.last-p: By using Toolsify AI Directory, you signify your acceptance of these Terms of Service.
